targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_miss"}[1m])))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_data_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_data_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_data_miss"}[1m])))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_filter_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_filter_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_filter_miss"}[1m])))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_index_hit"}[1m])) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_index_hit"}[1m])) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="block_cache_index_miss"}[1m])))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_bloom_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="bloom_prefix_useful"}[1m])) / sum(rate(tikv_engine_bloom_efficiency{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", db="$db", type="bloom_prefix_checked"}[1m]))

This is the summary of the file count has been flushed, summered by the data each TiKV has flushed since last boot.  
**NOTE: The size may get reduced if some of TiKVs reboot.**

panels.description:
This is the summary of the size has been flushed, summered by the data each TiKV has flushed since last boot.  
**NOTE: The size may get reduced if some of TiKVs reboot.**

This is the summary of the file count has been flushed, summered by the data each TiKV has flushed since last boot.  
**NOTE: The size may get reduced if some of TiKVs reboot.**
panels.title: Flush Files (Last 30m)

The duration of converting a raft request into a apply event.    
*This duration is for consuming a batch of events.*
panels.title: Convert Raft Event duration

panels.description:
The duration of waiting the mutex of the controller.    
*This duration is for consuming a batch of events.*
panels.title: Wait for Lock Duration

panels.description: The number of KV-modify of each raft command observed.
panels.title: Command Batch Size

panels.description:
The total cost of saving an event into temporary file.    
*This duration is for consuming a batch of events.*
panels.title: Save to Temp File Duration

panels.description:
The total cost of writing a event into temporary file.
Comparing to the ***Save*** duration, it doesn't contain the time cost of routing the task by range / task.    
*This duration is for consuming a batch of events, for one region or one table.*
panels.title: Write to Temp File Duration

panels.description:
The duration of collecting metadata and call the UNIX system call *write* for each event.    
*This duration is for consuming a batch of events, for one region or one table.*
panels.title: System Write Call Duration
